actions_model:
<model xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"
       xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n"
       i18n:domain="collective.easyform">
>
  <schema>
    <field name="mailer"
           type="collective.easyform.actions.Mailer"
    >
      <title i18n:translate="">Mailer</title>
      <description i18n:translate="">E-Mails Form Input</description>
      <replyto_field>replyto</replyto_field>
      <subject_field>topic</subject_field>
    </field>
  </schema>
</model>
fields_model:
<model xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"
       xmlns:easyform="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/easyform"
       xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n"
       i18n:domain="collective.easyform"
>
  <schema>
    <field easyform:TDefault="python:member and member.getProperty('email', '') or ''"
           easyform:serverSide="False"
           easyform:validators="isValidEmail"
           name="replyto"
           type="zope.schema.TextLine"
    >
      <description />
      <title i18n:translate="">Your E-Mail Address</title>
    </field>
    <field name="topic"
           type="zope.schema.TextLine"
    >
      <description />
      <title i18n:translate="">Subject</title>
    </field>
    <field name="comments"
           type="zope.schema.Text"
    >
      <description />
      <title i18n:translate="">Comments</title>
    </field>
  </schema>
</model>
title: Un formulario
